content:
Kyle Phillips  tackles Drew Lock  during game against Missouri on Nov PERIOD   at Neyland Stadium PERIOD

Tennessee had a shot to become bowl eligible with a win against Missouri on Saturday at Neyland Stadium PERIOD

The Tigers did not comply as they won their thirdstraight SEC game and handed the Vols a loss on senior day PERIOD

Here are some takeaways from the Tigers  win

Guarantano goes down

Tennessee starting quarterback Jarrett Guarantano was knocked out of the game late in the first quarter against the Tigers PERIOD He was 0of2 and Missouri sacked him twice in his limited playing time PERIOD

Jeremy Pruitt the Vols head coach is unsure of his status going forward PERIOD

I havent seen the docs yet Pruitt said PERIOD But Keller takes every rep that Jarrett does. guarantano was replaced by redshirtsenior Keller Chryst PERIOD At halftime Pruitt announced that Guarantano would not return to the game PERIOD

Keller is a hard worker Pruitt said PERIOD Hes been great for our program PERIOD Our kids love him. chryst led the team to a touchdown on his first drive of the game along with a scoring drive to open the second half but he did not find much success elsewhere PERIOD He finished the game 7of19 for  yards and two interceptions PERIOD

Keller stepped up offensive lineman Ryan Johnson said PERIOD We have faith in our quarterbacks. prehalf struggles

During Tennessees upset win over Kentucky last week the Vols took a commanding  lead into halftime after a lastsecond touchdown grab by Marquez Callaway PERIOD

This week Tennessee struggled in the waning moments of the first half PERIOD After a 49yard catch by Callaway the Vols stalled inside the fiveyard line and were forced to kick a field goal trimming the deficit to  PERIOD

An onside kick attempt failed on the ensuing kickoff and Missouri capitalized with a touchdown PERIOD After driving back down the field on offense Chryst threw an interception that was returned for  yards PERIOD

The Tigers closed the half with a thirddown touchdown play with less than  seconds remaining in the opening session giving them a  lead at the intermission PERIOD

Right before the half the score is  Pruitt said PERIOD Theres two things that can happen you can run the clock out and kick a field goal or you can run the clock and puntwe had a chance to put some points on the board and we made a bad throwthats probably at least a 10point swing there. lock excels

Missouri senior quarterback Drew Locks experience showed on Saturday at Neyland Stadium PERIOD

In the first half Lock was 14of20 for  yards and two touchdowns PERIOD He passed former Georgia quarterback David Greene for second place alltime in career passing yards in the SEC PERIOD

Lock finished the game 21of30 for  yards and two touchdowns PERIOD He did not throw an interception PERIOD

They just did a really good job of changing up their run plays and changing their calls linebacker Daniel Bituli said PERIOD

Tigers running back Larry Roundtree carried the ball  times for  yards and a touchdown PERIOD

Callaway continues to find success

Tennessee junior wide receiver Marquez Callaway continued to make plays for the Vols offense on Saturday PERIOD

He caught a 49yard pass late in the first half and he added a 49yard circus grab on the opening drive of the second half PERIOD

With just under  minutes left in the third quarter Callaway was hit by a Missouri defender after an incomplete pass PERIOD He came out of the game and did not return PERIOD

Callaway finished the game with two catches for  yards on three targets PERIOD

Next up

Tennessee travels to Vanderbilt for a meeting with the Commodores on Saturday at  p.m PERIOD ET in Nashville PERIOD

Vanderbilt has won four out of the last six meetings in the rivalry PERIOD The Vols need a win to become bowl eligible for the first time since  PERIOD

Its an SEC game Bituli said PERIOD Our pride is on the linewe just gotta come out there and adjust from this week. log In
